title: Jack the Ripper's Black Magic Rituals (2002).epub Gooner
description:
Jack the Ripper's Black Magic Rituals (2002).epub Gooner

Publisher: Blake Publishing; New edition edition (25 Sept. 2002)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1904034276
ISBN-13: 978-1904034278

For more than a century, the horrific mystery of Jack the Ripper has endured. The crimes of one of the world's most notorious serial killers have gone down in history as some of the most appalling acts one man could ever inflict upon other human beings; and since they were committed, sleuths have made many attempts to identify the man behind the myth. However, nobody has yet revealed the true identity of the murderer to the satisfaction of "ripperologists" everywhere. This book aims to reveal the identity of Jack the Ripper. It takes the reader, step-by-step, through the events at the core of the Ripper's "reign of terror", and uncovers a twisted melange of murder and black magic. The author argues that the man behind these crimes was Dr Robert Donston Stephenson, an army surgeon, occultist and magician with an astonishingly high IQ. He suggests that Stephenson may even have viciously murdered and dismembered his own wife before the killing spree in Whitechapel started
